title: HIV funding and estimated future requirements
subtitle: Estimated resources dedicated to prevention and treatment of [HIV](#dod:hiv), and care and support activities. These are shown against UNAIDS estimates of annual resource needs to meet [Fast-Track HIV targets](#dod:fast-track-unaids-hiv) by 2030. This data is expressed in US dollars, adjusted for inflation.
